modName: Light Armor Iron Helm and Gauntlets
summary: This mod adds the Iron Helm and Iron Gauntlets as a light armor.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds the Iron Helm and Iron Gauntlets as a light armor. It doesn\'t change the original items, but adds new ones instead. 

=== Item Codes ===

Helm = 0x01001001
Gauntlets = 0x01001000

Note: The value of \"x\" depends on the load order of the .esp file.

=== Installation ===

Extract the .esp into your Skyrim data folder.

=== Uninstallation ===

Delete the .esp file from your Skyrim data folder.

===Note===

If for some reason, you can\'t get this mod to work, please let me know so that I can take a look at it and try to figure out what the problem is. The most likely cause would be that this mode shares item ids with another one you have enabled. I had issues changing the item ids to what I wanted (was unable to do so). When the creation kit is released I will releasing an updated version of this mod.
author: Shadow5973
